author: Joseph Santini
description: Some cocktail historians, Ted Haigh included, consider the Crusta the forerunner of the Sidecar and in turn the Margarita.
name: Crustas (generic name)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass
